title: HRI Online
subtitle: Thank you for your attention, your support and your love. For the past 19 years, HRI has provided 100% free legal and social services to vulnerable refugees immigrants. Everyday we give thanks for our community that has held us up. Thank You  pic.twitter.com/TVFJemZCaQ

title: Jennifer Chen
subtitle: Proud to present to the Committee on Community Services and speak on behalf of the ethnocultural communities. Budget cuts will have a huge impact on immigrants, refugees, and Indigenous people, their voices are the most needed to be heard. #Winnipeg #wpgpolipic.twitter.com/0aLBkn3okO

title: Raya Kalash

title: virtualmuseum.ca
subtitle: In 1940, when Canada agreed to take in “enemy aliens” and prisoners of war, it did not expect to also receive refugees from Nazism, most of them Jews. This is their story. @theVHEC https://buff.ly/2QF3Nop pic.twitter.com/RcXafHdpMd

title: ImmigrationWatReg
subtitle: Meet Kathy Elliott, she is an exemplary resident who, along with her husband Tim, has been involved in helping refugees with affordable housing in #WatReg for many years by  keeping the cost of their unit low and renting it without a last month's rent deposit.  #DoingGreatThingspic.twitter.com/MDTpKBecbk

title: Eli Dror
subtitle: Dozens killed in #Albania earthquake, #Israel sends rescue teams to help. Albania PM: "We are not alone." Independence Day celebrations canceled, old refugees in tents and football field: "My daughters were killed, how will I live? It's a shame I didn't die with them. pic.twitter.com/3ForvUHDci

title: KWWL
subtitle: HAPPENING NOW — The Davenport Diocese Bishop Thomas Zinkula is at the Iowa City Catholic Worker House hearing from refugee families. This meeting is ahead of an ICE checkin for a newly arrived refugee. The Diocese will accompany them to their appointment in Cedar Rapids today. pic.twitter.com/Q7bLbRhAG0

title: URDA
subtitle: Supporting agricultural projects is an important way to help refugees and the host community. In this spirit, with the support of a benefactor, the development sector at URDA was able to invest in an agricultural project in Mount Lebanon area. Read more: http://bit.ly/2ONwNI6 pic.twitter.com/bfAIs2xvia

title: Anita Vandenbeld
subtitle: I joined Parishioners from St. Rémi and other churches to welcome 40 Congolese refugees they have sponsored.
